history.description: Established in 2021 by Mr. Rajarajan with a singular focus on promoting football in Tamil Nadu, FC TamiLionS has grown rapidly to become a cornerstone of youth development in the region.

points: Groom and develop young football talent
Provide a structured pathway to national & international football
Represent India in top leagues and national teams
Significant contribution to Tamil Nadu and Indian football
